strIntroduction: Set around traditional Al-Ándalus architecture, and enjoy the wonderful Turkish baths. It will be the best way to refresh yourself in Madrid.

The Thyssen - Bornemisza Museum is part of the Golden Triangle of Art of Madrid, offering its outstanding family collection since 1982, located at the heart of the capital. Get to know The Avenue of Art in in all its splendour at the Thyssen - Bornemisza Museum.

Perched dramatically on a steep gorge, the historic town of Ronda is choc-a-bloc with sights, attractions and culture. Approached through breath-taking, hilly countryside, Ronda is an enchanting destination for a guided excursion.

Join us and on this full day tour of the ancient town of Tangier, just a short boat ride across the Straits of Gibraltar. Indulge in the exotic sights and sounds of this enchanting North African city.
Have an enjoyable and entertaining day at PortAventura: go on 40 rides, go all over exotic places and enjoy magical shows

strIntroduction: Your first contact with the wonders that hides the sea.How to know if you want to be a diver if you've never tried? Are you willing to live one of the most exciting experiences of your life? To breathe under water like a fish?

The CDLN pool party at Hostal CDLN (opposite Sankeys) runs night time from 9pm – midnight (best after boat or before clubbing) . Your e-ticket includes open bar (all drinks), char-grilled BBQ and a wide range of side dishes.

Discover 3 of Catalonia's most iconic wineries with your local guide in the Penedes Wine Region! Learn how different varieties of wine are produced and have the opportunity to taste them! First we will visit the award-winning Bodegues Jean Leon in central Penedes where we will do two wine tastings. Then head to Bodegues Torres to learn more about wine production, followed by a wine tasting of three wines, as well as three local cheeses. Finally, visit Caves Freixenet learning about the process of making cava. You’ll sample two cavas with delicious tapas.
strTitle: Wine and Cava Day Trip from Barcelona

strIntroduction: Discover one of the monuments par excellence of Madrid with skip-the-line access with the Madrid Card Royal Palace. Travel from Madrid on a full-day trip to the imperial city of Toledo, one of Europe’s oldest cities and home to famous works by El Greco. Tour the Gothic cathedral, and see the Church of Santo Tome, the former synagogue of Santa Maria la Blanca, and more.

Soar over the intriguing island of Ibiza during an exhilarating 2-hour parasailing experience from San Antonio. Glide over the iridescent waves of the Mediterranean Sea on a sleek speedboat, then feel your adrenaline levels surge as your take to the skies and gaze down at the rugged peaks of mountains and the sandy curve of the coast. Choose to depart at sunset to make your experience even more magical and enjoy a complimentary drink as you watch the sun sink into the horizon.

You always wanted to take an exciting cooking course and prepare a delicious and authentic Mediterranean meal? Hands on! Learn about Mediterranean cuisine from local experts by cooking a four courses menu using the freshest seasonal ingredients! In the class taught in English our professional Chef will explain the dishes you will prepare. The classes are designed for experienced and novice cooks. Apron and recipes are provided. We will then open the first bottles of wine. Immerse yourself in the textures, flavors and scents of traditional Spanish dishes and ready to receive plenty of information!

strIntroduction: Open your eyes to Ibiza’s magical underwater world that is sure to be the highlight of your Ibiza adventure. Tailored for beginners, this course is perfect for those who want to discover the dazzling array of fish and marine life waiting just below the surface of the glistening Mediterranean. We provide you with a safe and comfortable environment in which to improve your diving skills.

Indulge in a well-deserved retreat with our Food and Wine Escapade in Barcelona Barcelona has it all: history, design, shopping, Mediterranean charm… and delicious food! Simply exploring the historic centre of Barcelona is a true pleasure, with main sights at walking distance from your charming hotel, including the beautiful Gothic quarter and the Cathedral, the lively Rambla and Gaudi’s fascinating buildings. Enjoy a delicious dinner at a Michelin-starred restaurant, and spend time with our personable local chef, who will guide you through a private visit to the colorful Boqueria food market.

For centuries, Spanish conquistadors set off on their voyages of discovery from Seville, Europe’s foremost gateway to the New World. Now you can discover the old world charm of the capital of Andalusia, an elegant and cosmopolitan city that will keep you enthralled and your photo album full.
There's no better way to see the sights and learn the history of Barcelona than by joining a bike tour!

Savor the artistic and historical richness of Salamanca and Portugal. Be enthralled by its emblematic architectural jewels and traditions with an unforgettable 5-day tour from Madrid. A unique experience discovering the charm of these fascinating destinations in all its grandeur!
strTitle: 5-day tour around Ávila, Salamanca, Portugal and Caceres from Madrid

strIntroduction: Discover Gran Canaria's natural habitat on an electric bike tour around Ayagaures, one of the island's most idyllic places. Enjoy the beautiful landscape on a sporting and ecological activity!

The fastest way to see Ibiza is with our thrilling and action-packed speedboat adventure, which zooms along either the north or south coast, exploring beaches, coves, caves, reefs and much, much more. Join us for this exciting two-hour jaunt and discover parts of the island that few visitors ever have the chance to see.
Cooltra is the leading scooter rental company in Spain. Take advantage of the freedom a scooter gives you and discover places a conventional tourist will miss.

Explore the capital of Mallorca at your own pace with a 7-day Las Palmas Card and get free admission to more than 20 attractions, along with discounts on shopping, at restaurants and selected bars. Discover the home of Christopher Columbus, and more.

Learn how to cook an authentic Valencian paella in the home of the traditional Spanish paella. Visit the Valencia Central Market to learn about the ingredients necessary to make a traditional paella and then participate in a small group paella making competition before having the chance to try your own creation, as well as other authentic tapas.

Just two nautical miles south of Ibiza is the stunning and virtually unspoiled island of Formentera, one of the few remaining secrets of not just the Balearics but the whole of Europe. A visit to this idyllic hideaway is the icing on the cake of any Ibiza holiday.
strTitle: Formentera ferry ticket from San Antonio

strIntroduction: This amusement park has been wowing locals and visitors alike since the Swinging Sixties.

Located in the historical section of Ronda town, in a palace-like house with more than a thousand years of history. The old wine cellar has been transformed into a marvellous museum featuring twelve thematic rooms. Each invites the visitor to discover through the history and culture of wine, a product strongly present in Spanish society and associated to mythology and religion, and whose elaboration is a process of traditional work both in the countryside and in the wine cellar.
Learn about San Sebastian's history and Basque culture on a half-day guided tour while sampling the city's best pintxos (Basque tapas) and wines
strTitle: San Sebastian Tapas Walking Small group tour

strIntroduction: Understand more about the diverse nature of life on Earth and the mysterious manner
Choose among imaginative routes, on board a state-of-the-art machine and get to know Madrid the way it deserves to be visited.

Sample traditional Dutch food and drink on a food tour of picturesque Amsterdam. Try salty edam and smoky gouda cheeses, learn about the city’s spice trade at a spice house, and visit a 17th-century distillery to sip on some hard liquor.

Discover Bruges – one of the most captivating cities in Belgium – on this day trip from Amsterdam. After traveling to Bruges by coach, you will receive a brief overview of city sights from your knowledgeable guide. Then, enjoy 5 full hours exploring the churches, canals and lace shops of Bruges on your own. See the Begijnhof, the city gates and the eye-catching windmills. And indulge in some delicious Belgian chocolates on your ride back to Amsterdam!
Experience that ultimate Amsterdam night out that you have been waiting all your life.
Explore Amsterdam the ‘Dutch way’ – by bike! Following an expert local guide, enjoy a leisurely 3-hour bike ride around Amsterdam’s typically flat and open city streets – perfect for cycling!

Getting around Amsterdam is a breeze with a hop-on hop-off Canal Bus Day Pass. The boats operate a regular service along Amsterdam's canals, following four routes: the Green Line, Red Line, Blue Line and Orange Line. While you cruise, an on-board commentary provides interesting information about Amsterdam.

Explore Amsterdam’s Red Light District at night, when it truly comes alive. Your resident guide will show you the secret areas, and the back alleys of De Wallen. Visit coffee shops, meet local workers, and finish off at Cafe Remember with shots.
strTitle: Amsterdam Red Light District Walking Tour

strIntroduction: We the solution for all your group transfers from and to Schiphol Airport Amsterdam and Amsterdam City Centre

strTitle: Holland in One Day Sightseeing Tour

strIntroduction: Sail along Amsterdam's stunning canals at twilight and enjoy a delicious pizza as you cruise. This evening tour is the perfect introduction to Amsterdam, and great fun for all the family!

Sit back and relax on a 2-hour candlelight cruise along Amsterdam's famous canals, the perfect way to unwind from a day of sightseeing or set the mood for a romantic night. Aboard a glass-enclosed boat, cozy up with your special someone while enjoying unlimited wine and cheese and admiring fantastic waterfront views. This is an unforgettable way to experience Amsterdam's UNESCO World Heritage-listed canals!
strTitle: Amsterdam Canals Candlelight Cruise Including Wine and Cheese
